definition: to toss and turn
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
the side/to incline towards/to lean/inclined/lateral/side
lean on one side
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)

sentences.english: It's possible that nightly nicotine withdrawal could be causing you to toss and turn.
sentences.chinese: 可能是因为尼古丁的残留物在夜间会使你辗转反侧。

sentences.english: Still, you're not doomed to toss and turn night after night.
sentences.chinese: 然而，你并非注定要夜夜辗转反侧。

sentences.english: He tossed on the ground that night.
sentences.chinese: 那天夜里他在地上辗转反侧。

sentences.english: He was talking in his sleep and moving uneasily on the bed.
sentences.chinese: 他在说梦话而且在床上不安地辗转反侧着。

sentences.english: When tears come down like falling rain, you'll toss around and call my name.
sentences.chinese: 当泪如雨下，你将辗转反侧呼唤我的名字。

sentences.english: Toss and turn restlessly, doomed without dream tonight.
sentences.chinese: 辗转反侧，注定今宵无梦。

sentences.english: They get up low whisper, no let me toss and turn restlessly not go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他们起床时低声的细语，没有让我辗转反侧睡不下去。

sentences.english: So why are you still tossing and turning?
sentences.chinese: 但是为什么总是躺在床上辗转反侧呢？

sentences.english: Or perhaps the tumbling stock market has you tossing and turning past lights-out.
sentences.chinese: 或者是下挫的股市让你辗转反侧不能入睡？

sentences.english: You toss and turn, but sleep won't come.
sentences.chinese: 你辗转反侧，但总也睡不着。

sentences.english: The night is halcyon, high in my family each room, lay tossing and turning.
sentences.chinese: 夜色宁静，高家人各自躺在本人的房间，辗转反侧。

sentences.english: The night drags on, and I toss till dawn.
sentences.chinese: 然而，长夜漫漫，我辗转反侧，直到黎明。

sentences.english: The sick child tumbled restlessly in his bed.
sentences.chinese: 生病的小孩在床上辗转反侧焦躁不安。

sentences.english: I tossed about all night, unable to fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我彻夜辗转反侧，无法入睡。

sentences.english: My husband, Frank, lying beside me, must have been aware of my tossing and turning.
sentences.chinese: 躺在我身边的丈夫福兰克一定知道我在辗转反侧。

sentences.english: The night before the exam, he lingered at his parents’ bedside, unable to sleep for hours.
sentences.chinese: 高考前一夜，刘在父母床边辗转反侧难以入睡。

definition: to change one's viewpoint/to turn from side to side (in bed)
lit. awake or asleep/at any time
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)
variant of 輾轉|辗转[zhan3 zhuan3]
hundred knots of worry in one's intestines (idiom); weighed down with anxiety
every night
to sleep soundly/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
to go and come back/to make a return trip/backwards and forwards (e.g. of piston or pump action)/to reciprocate (of machine part)
to sleep/to hibernate
to be unable to sleep at night
for a while
anxiety/worries
late at night/in the dead of night
to be dead drunk
hurt and disappointed/blurry and unclear
to ponder a solution/to consider (the best move, how to find a way etc)
